textBox.richText: I realize that a large number of people have been anxiously awaiting the release of 1.5.3 for seSales. Unfortunately the final phase of testing has been taking a bit longer than expected. With the release of Leopard, Apple has made some subtle changes to the way that Currency Localization is done. As a result we are making sure we get that localization perfect before releasing 1.5.3. I do apologize for the delays but it will definitely be worth it!
